page.title: 02Nicola's Saturday
page.content: I didn't get up very early on Saturday as there was no school.My brother and sister were up before me,and my mum had a 'lie in' as well.When I got downstairs my Dad had made a cup of tea and was reading 'The Sun'. The hairdresser came to do my mum's hair in streaks and to cut my fringe. I went and did some shopping with my mum and sister then we had dinner. After dinner my dad went to the pub and I helped my mum make a surprise tea for him. We made a trifle, sandwiches and sausage rolls. Me and my sister made some cakes and I iced a birthday cake. My mum and stepbrother went to the pub to fetch him. When he found out he was very happy. After the party we watched television then at 10.00 p.m. I went to bed.
